article: I go to school by bus every day. It is always very crowded  on the bus. It is so _ . One day I told my parents that I didn't like taking the bus to school. Then my _ told me about his story. When he was young, he _ in he countryside. It was near a _ . So people there had to go out by boat. _ parents didn't have much money, but they let him go to school. Every morning he got up very _ . It was dark  . Then he went to take a _ . It took him abut thirty minutes . Then he had to walk for another twenty minutes. He was always _ because he could have the chance  to study, although  it was very cold in winter. _ I heard my father's story, I felt very sorry. I _ think like that. From then on I go to school happily by bus every day.
